docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, June 7--Leland Harrison, retired career diplomat and former Assistant Secretary of State, died at Emergency Hospital here last midnight, after a long illness, at the age of 68. He had entered the hospital on May 15.
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, June 7--Leland Harrison, retired career diplomat and former Assistant Secretary of State, died at Emergency Hospital here last midnight, after a long illness, at the age of 68. He had entered the hospital on May 15.

headline.main: LELAND HARRISON EX-DIPLOMAT, DIES; Former Assistant Secretary of State Dies at Capital-- Held Other Major Posts

byline.original: Special to THE NEW YORK TIMES

docs.snippet: BUENOS AIRES, June 7--Democracia's columnist "Descartes," who is popularly supposed to be President Juan Peron, made a violent attack on the United States in his weekly page one contribution today.
docs.lead_paragraph: BUENOS AIRES, June 7--Democracia's columnist "Descartes," who is popularly supposed to be President Juan Peron, made a violent attack on the United States in his weekly page one contribution today.
docs.abstract: Buenos Aires Democracia columnist, allegedly Peron, charges that US provokes anti-Argentina sentiment in Latin Amer; article revives S Braden issue and alleges US gen in Mex City recruits for invasion army; denial by US noted

headline.main: ANTI-U.S. COMMENT ASCRIBED TO PERON; A Columnist in Buenos Aires, Believed to Be He, Sees Bribery of Latin Press

byline.original: By FOSTER HAILEY Special to THE NEW YORK TIMES
